info.name: Google Search +
info.description: This just makes a few adjustments to the home, search and images pages for google.
info.additionalInfo: V1.2 (September 19th, 2018): ► Fixed Dictionary panel. └ When you search "Define [WORD]" ► Changes to certain elements. ► Moved Seperate Search Results into an option. └ For those who don't really like this deisgn. V1.1 (July 5th, 2018): ► Fixed "Google Apps" dropdown menu. ► Fixed Calculator. ► Fixes to google search maps. └ So if you search "LOCATION" to "LOCATION" it won't be all white and broken. ► Fixed some text areas that weren't white. V1.1 (July 2nd, 2018): ► Fixed a lot of shit. Just trust me. Plz

settings.label: Fixed search bar to top (Could be buggy)

options.label: Yes
options.value: .srg > .g, ._NId > .g, #brs > g-section-with-header {background: var(--bg1) !important; padding: 20px 20px 25px 20px; box-sizing: border-box; border-radius: 3px;}
